content: EdTeKLA Research Group Skip to content Welcome to EdTeKLA The Educational Technology, Knowledge, Language, and Learning Analytics (EdTeKLA) Research Group creates technologies to support people’s learning and then uses those technologies to study how people learn.​ Welcome to EdTeKLA The Educational Technology, Knowledge, Language, and Learning Analytics (EdTeKLA) Research Group creates technologies to support people’s learning and then uses those technologies to study how people learn. Welcome to EdTeKLA The Educational Technology, Knowledge, Language, and Learning Analytics (EdTeKLA) Research Group creates technologies to support people’s learning and then uses those technologies to study how people learn. What We Develop Latest News AllAccepted PapersScholarships/Awards ACL 2022 Paper AcceptanceThe Association for Computational Linguistics has accepted our paper: Cree Corpus: A Collection of nêhiyawêwin Resources for their 2022 conference. Congratulations Leticia!Leticia Farias Wanderly graduated last spring of 2021, receiving her Masters of Science – thesis-based program, in Computing Science.
